name: Steets, Appellant, v. Sovereign Construction Co., Ltd.

judges: Before Bell, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Steets, Appellant, v. Sovereign Construction Co., Ltd.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on the opinion of Judge Guerin, published in 32 Pa. D. & C. 2d 690.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John J. McCarty, with him Charles A. Lord, and Richter, Lord, Toll and Cavanaugh, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Steets, Appellant, v. Sovereign Construction Co., Ltd.
Argued November 21, 1963.
March 17, 1964:
Before Bell, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
John J. McCarty, with him Charles A. Lord, and Richter, Lord, Toll and Cavanaugh, for appellant.
Francis E. Marshall, for appellee.
